author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...EYEWALL OF RAFAEL APPROACHING THE SOUTH COAST OF WESTERN CUBA... ...3 PM EST POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...EYEWALL OF RAFAEL APPROACHING THE SOUTH COAST OF WESTERN CUBA... ...3 PM EST POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 3:00 PM EST Wed Nov 6
 the center of Rafael was located near 22.4, -82.6
 with movement NW at 14 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 956 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.
